approved by the Ministry of Education, implements the spirit of the National Education Conference and implements the Opinions of the Ministry of Education on Accelerating the Construction of High-level Undergraduate Education and Comprehensively Improving Talent Training Ability, Teacher Education Revitalization Action Plan (2018-2022), Higher Education Vocational Education Innovation Development Plan (2015-2018) Basic Requirements for the Teaching of Chinese philosophy Theory Courses in Colleges and Universities in the New Era and Several Opinions of the Ministry of Education on Strengthening the Construction of Situation and Policies Courses in Colleges and Universities in the New Era spirit, adhere to the spirit of The fundamental task of fostering people, promoting the reform of higher education teaching, improving the quality of higher education teaching, and advancing education equity are also important actions for building brilliant courses and implementing the Double Ten Thousand Plan of top-quality courses.Ten Lectures on Mathematical Culture  Gu Pei, Li Jun and Xiang BingResearch Methodology  Zhang Weigang, Song Feng, Ma Xiurong, Jiang JunfenThe Introduction to Environmental Science  Chu Chunli Ecological Civilization  Gong Ke, Wang Lihua, Fang Jingyun, Xu He, Wu ZhichChinese Traditional Culture  Zhang Rongming and Liang NanCharacter and Cultivation in Chinese Classical Poetry  Zhang Jing, Mr. Ye Jiaying and Yan XiaozhengHealth Guidance and Scientific Medication  Zhang JinglingCritical Thinking and Critical Writing  Tang LeiEnvironmental Chemistry  Sun Hongwen, Wang Lei, Yao Yiming, Shi Guoliang anByzantine History and Culture  Chen Zhiqiang, Wu Peng, Zheng Wei and Pang GuoqingIdeological and Moral Cultivation and
